original_title: M男クン家に泊まろう！ 大浦真奈美
overview: Kiminoheya, Tomarel? The AV actress I admired came to stay at her house... Don't you think it's the best? "It's been a long time since I've been an amateur boy, and you're staying over, right? Are you okay? Maybe I'll do it all night (laughs)" Actress Manami Oura stays at the house of an amateur who has been publicly recruited, and flirts like a newly-married couple... While drinking alcohol, teasing and teasing all the time until the morning comes. agony night. Fucking all night long and not being allowed to sleep... Make M-kun panic in his brain and get excited, do whatever you want★ Ad lib All Night Slut LIVE! !
title: Let's Stay at Mr. Masochist's House! Manami Oura
